places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Sai Palace, Balangir
address: Kacheri Chowk, Priyadarshani Talkies Road, Balangir, Odisha 767001, India

reviews.text:
Unclean rooms - bed had cockroaches and other insects!! (photo attached)
They charged us separately for breakfast - where there were not too many options - idlis were inedible when we asked for toast (as it is a safe option), we were told toaster is not working so if we wanted toast they have to do it on a tawa, we agreed to that and asked for 4 slices of toast but served only 3!!
Our journey was delayed by few hrs and we asked for few hrs extension and expected to pay a fair fee, but the front desk guy charged us full room charges for another full day and night!
This place takes advantage of the fact that there are not too many options available in a place like Bolangir

Food was good. Rooms were adequate size with standard amenities. But not wow. Banquet hall for 50guest is there. Good place. Parking is a issue. And turn to reach hotel from the main road is bit clumsy. We had banquet buffet with chicken and meat dishes. Okay for family
Excellent behaviour of the staff..Tasty and a variety of breakfast options.

Me and my cousins went there for a birthday party. But the restaurant is extremely small. They have limited seats and the place is packed. Staff are repeatedly ignoring us because they don't have seats to give us.. still they can say it properly in a good way. But they chose to ignore and later said that it will be vacant after 10 mins. After waiting for another 10 mins also they don't provide seats. Very disappointed.

Had booked a stay for friends and relatives and they enjoyed the hospitality. Rooms are spacious, service is good, and the food is also nice. The owner is a super chilled out person, and will recommend this hotel to everyone. It's way better than other hotels in town, location is also in close proximity to all necessary places.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Apoorva Royale
address: Anand Niketan Marg, Near, Circuit House Rd, Salepali, Khujenpali, Odisha 767001, India

reviews.text: The property is very nice, with loads of amenities and in house restaurant. Rooms are spacious clean and neatly maintained. Service is prompt and satisfactory. Only disadvantage is location which feels a bit aloof from normal traffic route. However a very nice stay and pretty much recommended.

Excellent hotel  ideally located at the heart of the Bolangir Town. The rooms are specious, extremely clean & comfortable. Upon arrival we were warmly welcomed by the friendly staffs. The food was delicious with nice selection of breakfast, lunch & dinner.Would definitely recommend this hotel to everyone for quality & Value.

Worst hotel to stay specially the food . Both are so expensive and they first promise you for discount and when you are leaving they argue not to promise about the discount and that to im facing these issues after 4 time continue visit. With this behaviour and service is done to  regular customer god forbid the new commer.
Plz have a visit, you will be happy with hospitality as well as food quality

Roof top dining is the most attractive point of this hotel

Good for family outing.. enjoy the dinner

places_with_reviews.name: Sarojinee Residency
address: Infront HP Petrol Pump, Adarsha Pada, District Cold Storage Rd, Balangir, Odisha 767002, India

reviews.text: Good hotel. Room services are bit sluggish, may be small town effect. Cordial staff. Please take your own toiletries, hair dryer with you.
Rooms and service good but we were duped of Rs 3500/- because of their faulty website which was hacked by the time we booked. So be cautious while booking for hotels that you find from Google.
Good Hotel in the city with spacious and clean rooms and food quality also good
Please be aware of fraud when you try to click the option of chat. Never ever book the hotel online. Pls  book only through known Agents
It was pricey ,  naan was tasteless and felt like eating chapati

places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL PARK LAND
address: Rugudipada Ram Mandir Rd, Rugudipada, Balangir, Odisha 767001, India

reviews.text: I love this hotel, it has a big hall feel to it. Very intimate common area spaces that are nicely decorated and feel very welcoming. the views to the marriage from the restaurant make for a delightful  experience if sitting in restaurant. Manager Sanjay made our function with smooth operation,was very concerned for each and everything .Every time he was stood up to help for Everything. make a point to enjoy a nice buffet dinner . Lavishing lobby , Beautiful interior and so peaceful..

Worst experience ever! Just checked out yesterday & I’d like to tell you the hotel staff is as lazy as they could ever be! It takes a hell lot of calls to be made for the simplest of requests to be fulfilled. Over anything, the staff is as less considerate of your needs as they could avoid!
Make a wise decision and don’t BOOK!

Rooms are well maintained. And also spacious. Staff are not skilled, they need improvement. Parking space is also not much better. Above all I had a good experience during my stay. Love to visit again.

Centrally located and conveniently accessable, from Bus Stop & Railway station, with good ambience and spacious room.
Hotel Manager Mr. Sanjay was readily available to address the customer needs to make a stay comfortable.
Centralized a/c, hot running water, spacious Hall for celebration and Restaurant is a plus.
In general hygiene and cleanliness is good though there is some scope to do proper dusting. Staff is polite and well behaved.

This hotel ambions is awesome...in  our 6 days stay...from starting to end match ...it was good stay aspects of room service and food at restaurant. Even though more than 50 players Hotel  Manager Mr.Sanjay was very cool and calm to handle everything with good manner .breakfast ,laundry service was on time...we all had good time in the hotel...best staffs behaviour ....

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Bhammars
address: Shiv Durga Complex, Sambalpur Rd, Balangir, Odisha 767001, India

reviews.text:
Service is too Poor
No Drinking water provided on Room service
Sanitation: Worst.
Lunch: too poor
We were here for almost half an hour, they were slow as new wedded bride. Even after complaining, zero response . Not satisfied.

Very very low quality service
Taste less food ever
Rooms are not so good pretty old matresses, the basins were chocking most of the time , no swimming pool available, but complimentary breakfast is very nice, must visit
Very nice place little  crowdy for parking

places_with_reviews.name: Triveni Hotel
address: Ramai Talkies Road, near Gurudwara, Rugudipada, Balangir, Odisha 767001, India

reviews.text: Not up to the mark. Many of the hotel staffs work very unprofessionally even the manager (specially mentioning manager bcoz as a leader we expect a bit more professional attitude from him). Rooms really needed to get renovated even the reception too. It seems that the appliances n switches are of a different era.

The hotel is at the heart of the city. Location is best near Ramai Takies. Food is good. Good for marriage bookings.

Room sizes are good. Quality of room are avarage.

Pro
Location , food quality and service

Con
Parking

Over all good for bolangir.
Value for money hotel.  No so cheap nor costly. Clean & maintained rooms, service also good.
Got married here and one more function after that..great hotel....value for money...
Worst hotel. They will cheat you every possible way.

places_with_reviews.name: Geetanjali Residency
address: PF58+J4C, Unnamed Road, Balangir, Odisha 767001, India

reviews.text:
Disappointing Experience with Unprofessional Service

I recently stayed at this hotel and had a disappointing experience. Upon arrival at 2 AM, I found the bathroom latch broken.After bringing it to the hotel's attention, they failed to resolve  the issue during our two-day stay. When we requested a more  three-hour extension for our 5 AM checkout, the owner responded unprofessionally, stating we shouldn't have accepted the room with a broken latch.and by 7 PM of the 2 nd day we decided to checkout and to shift to another hotel for a pleasant  stay. This lack of accountability and customer service left a negative impression. I do not recommend this hotel to others.
Very bad experience. No shop in the bathroom. Room properly not clean. Water not provided timely.
The experience was very bad and also the service was very poor, their manager including the owner are not solution oriented with a fully commercial & aurogent mindset.
Room are quite dirty. At morning water is not coming. T.V. is not coming. For only one day stay is okay but for one or more day to stay is not okay for my choice..
Well clean good behaviour renting

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Jk Residency , Balangir
address: near school thikadar para priyadarshini takies road, Thikadarpara, Balangir, Odisha 767001, India

reviews.text: Had a great experience, loved the vibe, I came for a business trip and stayed here. The staff were really supportive. Would love to recommend for traveller. Afordable yet luxurious.
Excellent facilities. Great staff. Nearby to all public spots like bus stop and station. Had a great experience staying in the hotel. A must visit hotel if anyone visiting bolangir

Nice hotel in the city centre. Rooms are clean and spacious. The price is okay. 4 stars for the breakfast that the hotel is arranging from outside. It is recommended to cook a good breakfast at the hotel.

The hotel exceeded expectations. Impeccable service, spacious and clean rooms. The staff was incredibly hospitable, making the stay truly enjoyable. The on-site dining options were exceptional, offering a variety of delicious cuisines. A top-notch experience that I highly recommend to all travelers.

The only thing is they don't have rooms for solo travelers and you have to adjust yourself in a double bed room.
Had a great experience staying in the hotel. Great staff along with best services

The rooms are full of bed bugs, never ever go to this hotel. The in-house restaurant doesn't have any variety in food items. The staffs' behavior also not good. Don't waste your money staying in this hotel.
Its getting older and rooms are not so good as compare to price. Need renovation.
Amazing room nd service is very faster of this hotel 🛏️

Rooms are good in size but poor maintenance. Ac rooms are useless, ac stop working and they charge is fully. Dont go for ac rooms. Breakfast is included in rent and you have only 2 options, Puri bhaji & Bread omlet along with half cup of tea. Breakfast items are ice chilled.
Hotel is having many rooms. Though room size is good, I didn't like it due to poor maintenance and bad odor. Overall cleanliness and decor is poor.  Staffs are good, well behaved and cooperative.

Overall Good dining experience.
Good Food.. Value for money. 👍
Good Service Hotel All Staff And Good Behavior 🥰🥰🥰

loved the wedding ceremony experience of my sister in law last week. beautiful location, great rooms at the resort with great food (odia marriages are all about foods :-) ) and great lush green garden. This is a great place for arranging wedding ceremonies and other family functions & get togethers. A definite recommedation

Pro:
From outdoor seating to indoor only good thing of this place is well maintained and good place to take photos

* Taste of veg dishes are quite decent

Cons:
1. There are a lot to dislike, my experience of having dinner here is not that good, from taste of food to behaviour of staff nothing is upto the mark for the price they charge.
2. Delayed food serving.
3. Even after complaining, the taste of dishes were unchanged.
4. Overpriced for the quality of food they serve.
5. Moreover, something that can catch you eye and put you in a complected situation is the plates where food was supposed to serve is not cleaned properly.
Beautiful location with hygienic and comfortable room and i love the the great lush green garden.this is a good place for arranging wedding ceremony and other family function.
